Detailed Description

Provide interface to convert object from pem format and convert object to a pem format. 

 gaia::security::Credentials* pCredentials = Credentials::getInstance();
 pCredentials->convertToPem(PEM_OBJECT*);

Definition at line 51 of file Credentials.h.

int32_t gaia::security::Credentials::pkcs12Parse ( const char *  pkcs12Path,
const char *  password,
PrivateKey **  privateKey,
X509Certificate **  x509Cert,
gaia::base::Vector< X509Certificate * > **  caCert 
)

Parses PKCS#12 file.

Parameters:
pkcs12PathThe path of the PKCS#12 file.
passwordThe password of the PKCS#12 file.
pkeyThe user key returned.
certThe user cert returned.
caThe other (CA) certs returned.Note either ca should be NULL, *ca should be NULL, or it should point to a valid STACK structure. pkey and cert can be passed unitialised.
Returns:
0 if successful, 1 otherwise.
